title: Librarything widget
content: Finished the librarything widget. It was a bit of a hassle to get the ‘Sidebar Widgets‘ to work since I’m not using the standard theme. But if you have WordPress 2+ and the classic or kubrick them you should have no trouble at all to get this to work. Well even if you don’t have a standard theme it’s still not that difficult to install, I’m just stupid sometimes :-p.
